item.title: Information About European Seminar2022
item.description: Hi, members. There is some good news that I am going to tell you. It is World MJER Iaido Federation’s “European Seminar2022”. The information is Here. (German Muso Jikiden Eishin Ryu Association web site) Please continue to confirm it. Thank you. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: About Kamata Seminar2020
item.description: Dear members. Kamata early summer seminar2020 has been cancelled. due to Coronavirus(COVID-19). Please take care of your health. stay home. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: The 8th Taikai Close
item.description: Novermber 4th, 2019. We held Federation 10th anniversary “the 8th taikai” at Kamata, Tokyo. Opening ceremony. A letter of appreciation was given by Esaka sense to those who cooperated in the development of the World MJER Iaido Federation. Tachi Uchi no Kurai. Enbu ~ Shinsa Awards ceremony. more pics available on here. A party after the 8th taikai. World MJER Iaido Federation 10th anniversary party. more pics available on here.

item.title: Singapore Seminar2019
item.description: We held the Singapore seminar2019 at August 23 - 25, 2019 See thier dojo’s website「厳洋館」(Genyo-kan). 厳洋館website https://www.mjersg.org/ 厳洋館facebook World MJER Iaido Federation Singapore seminar2019 Day1 Day2 Day3 World

item.title: Hokkaiido Spring Seminar2018
item.description: We held spring seminar at Hokkaido on May 28th, 2018. 16 participants from Asahikawa, Sapporo and Kitami. and, there were 4 World MJER Iaido Federation’s official teachers. We did these Keiko from 9:00 to 11:30. 太刀打の位(出合、拳取、絶妙剣、独妙剣、鍔留、受流、真方) 礼式 個々のポ
